title: mermaid
content:
hexo with mermaind

  1. install dependence

    yarn add hexo-filter-mermaid-diagrams

  2. config hexo

    # /_config.yml
mermaid:
  enable: true
  version: "7.1.2"
  # cdn: //cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mermaid@8.4.2/dist/mermaid.min.js
  #cdn: //cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mermaid/8.3.1/mermaid.min.js
  options: # 更多配置信息可以参考 https://mermaidjs.github.io/#/mermaidAPI
    theme: 'default'
    startOnLoad: true
    flowchart:
      useMaxWidth: false
      htmlLabels: true
🤡 🤡 🤡

I have used hexo theme with aurora, try inject script in _config.aurora.yml file like this:

injects:
  scripts:
    - <script src='https://unpkg.com/mermaid@7.1.2/dist/mermaid.min.js'></script>

But it not work.

So i add a polyfills file to listen the window history change and page refresh

Check what you want to copy to your config file 

const rewriteHistoryChangeStateFn = (type, callback) => {
    const prevHistoryFn = window.history[type];
    window.history[type] = (...args) => {
        const ret = prevHistoryFn.apply(window.history, > args);
        callback();
        return ret;
    };
};

rewriteHistoryChangeStateFn("pushState", () => addJs());
window.addEventListener('popstate', () => addJs());
window.addEventListener("load", () => addJs());

const scripts = [];
let id = 0;

const addJs = () => {
    scripts.forEach(item => {
        item.remove();
    });
    if(window.location.href.includes('mermaid')) {
        createScript('/downloads/script/mermaid.js')
    }
    if (window.location.href.includes('aiPhoto')) {
        createScript('/downloads/script/album.js')
    }
}

const createScript = (src) => {
    const script = document.createElement('script');
    script.src = src;
    script.id = id;
    scripts.push(script)
    document.getElementsByTagName('body')> [0].appendChild(script);
}

injects:
  scripts:
    - <script src='/downloads/script/polyfills.js'></script>
